title: Equality of elementary symplectic group and symplectic group
abstract:
V.I. Kopeiko proved that over a euclidean ring, the symplectic group defined
with respect to the standard skew-symmetric matrix is same as the elementary
symplectic group. Here we generalise the result of Kopeiko for a symplectic
group defined with respect to any invertible skew-symmetric matrix of Pfaffian
one.
